org.trianacode.gui.action.files

Class TaskGraphFileHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.gui.action.files.TaskGraphFileHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SelectionManager

    public class TaskGraphFileHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements SelectionManager
    A class to handle the loading and saving of TaskGraph files.

      • saveTaskGraphAs

        public static boolean saveTaskGraphAs(Tool task,
                      java.lang.String file,
                      ToolTable tools,
                      boolean updateRecent)
        Save a taskgraph/group to a file.
        Parameters:
        task - The Triana Tool object we want to save
        file - the file to save to
        tools - The tooltable (can be null)
        updateRecent - if true then the file is added to the recent items list

      • exportTaskgraph

        public static void exportTaskgraph()
        Show the export file dialog and export the current selected task graph using the selected FileImportExportDecorator.exportWorkflow method.

      • importTools

        public void importTools(ToolTable tooltable)
        Show the import fie dialog and import the tools from the selected file using the selected FileImportExportDecorator.importTools method. The imported tools are saved to the user selected toolbox in Triana format.
        Parameters:
        tooltable -
